description: Multiplyr is a web3-based company that is focused on building Affine DeFi, a decentralized finance platform designed to help users grow their money. The platform aims to create a more accessible and transparent financial system by utilizing blockchain technology to enable trustless transactions and avoid the need for intermediaries.
keyRoles: Collaborate with other engineers, designers, and product managers to develop the frontend interface of the Affine DeFi platform using Next.js, ethers.js, and react-bootstrap.
Contribute to defi-sdk, used to communicate between the frontend and blockchain.
Help develop and maintain authentication functionality for the platform.
Work on real-time data visualization for the platform, ensuring that data is displayed accurately and securely for authenticated users.
If needed, assist with backend tasks using FastAPI.
Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in DeFi and blockchain technology to ensure that the Affine DeFi platform is both secure and user-friendly.
Mentor and provide guidance to other frontend engineers on the team.

description: Shikho is a Bangladeshi educational technology startup that provides a mobile application to help students from Class 6 to Class 12 with their studies. The app offers a range of study materials such as video lessons, quizzes, and an AI-based virtual assistant to answer students' questions and provide personalized feedback based on their performance. Shikho's mission is to make quality education accessible to all students in Bangladesh, regardless of their socioeconomic status or geographic location.
keyRoles: Developing the front end of the Shikho web application using Next.js, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, while ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.

Implementing key features of the application such as course search, registration, payment processing, and user account management, and integrating third-party APIs such as payment gateways and course management systems.
Integrated video calling feature for live class perticipations for both students and teachers using WebRTC.

Collaborating with a team of developers, designers, and other stakeholders to plan, design, and develop the application, while participating in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality of the application.
Creating and maintaining documentation for the various components and features of the application, including user guides, technical specifications, and code documentation.
Ensuring high performance and scalability of the application by optimizing its design, architecture, and code, and implementing caching and load balancing strategies.

Ensuring the security and privacy of user data by implementing appropriate measures such as encryption, authentication, and access controls, and complying with industry standards such as PCI-DSS and GDPR.
Deploying the application to a production environment and ensuring that it is properly maintained and updated.
